name: part_009
file: tmp_【Mini 3D Live】hololive Indonesia Generasi 1 Bernyanyi Bersama #Area15Mini3DLive [oY0HSWOqV0s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: The members of hololive Indonesia Gen 1 (Risu, Moona, Iofi) finish their performance of 'secret base ~Kimi ga Kureta Mono~' and wave to the audience.
MC section starts standing. They reflect on the emotional song they just performed.
The members sit down on the floor to continue the MC, discussing their performance so far and Risu's dancing.
Moona leads into a special announcement.
The announcement for hololive Indonesia 1st Generation 3D Acrylic Stands is revealed and discussed.

subtitles.original: うわああああ！
subtitles.english: Whoaaa!

subtitles.original: Menyedihkan sekali. Moona tadi terharu.
subtitles.english: It's so sad. Moona was moved just now.

subtitles.original:
Tahu nggak, tahu nggak liriknya tadi
"Natsu yasumi wa owari" apa gitu...
subtitles.english:
You know, you know the lyrics earlier
were "The summer vacation is ending" or something...

subtitles.original: Owatchau kara.
subtitles.english: Because it's ending.

subtitles.original: Owatchau kara, iya ini udah mau habis natsu yasumi-nya.
subtitles.english:
Because it's ending, yeah,
the summer vacation is almost over.

subtitles.original: Oh iya natsu yasumi-nya. Natsu yasumi...
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, the summer vacation. Summer vacation...

subtitles.original: Hah... Guys, mau pada duduk nggak? Capek.
subtitles.english: Hah... Guys, do you want to sit down? Tired.

subtitles.original: Iya nih, duduk yuk yuk yuk yuk kita duduk...
subtitles.english: Yeah, let's sit, let's sit, let's sit down...

subtitles.original: Nah, jadi teman-teman...
subtitles.english: So, friends...

subtitles.original: Bagaimana? Sudah bernyanyi berapa lagu tadi? Satu...
subtitles.english: How was it? How many songs have we sung so far? One...

subtitles.original: Empat.
subtitles.english: Four.

subtitles.original: Empat ya? Empat. Empat. Empat.
subtitles.english: Four, right? Four. Four. Four.

subtitles.original:
Langsung tuh, nggak ada break.
Hayolo langsung empat LIVE, teman-teman.
subtitles.english:
Straight away, no break.
Look at that, four songs LIVE, friends.

subtitles.original: Moona capek langsung tek-tek-tek-tek.
subtitles.english: Moona is tired from going at it one by one.

subtitles.original: Iya langsung masuk, keluar, wheee!
subtitles.english: Yeah, straight in, out, wheee!

subtitles.original: Masuk, Peko!
subtitles.english: Entering, Peko!

subtitles.original: Nah, jadi gini, guys.
subtitles.english: So, it's like this, guys.

subtitles.original: Kalian, kalian pilih lagu-lagu ini kenapa sih?
subtitles.english: You guys, why did you choose these songs?

subtitles.original: Hmm... Kalau tadi tuh yang pertama banget ya...
subtitles.english: Hmm... As for the first one...

subtitles.original:
Lagu apa sih? Start:Dash!! itu...
karena kita bertiga kan ya? Bertiga.
subtitles.english:
What song was it? "Start:Dash!!"...
because there's three of us, right? Three.

subtitles.original: PIONEER.
subtitles.english: PIONEER.

subtitles.original: Oh my god, bestie kita Pioneerrr!
subtitles.english: Oh my god, bestie, we are Pioneer!

subtitles.original: Masa sih?
subtitles.english: Really?

subtitles.original: Tahu nggak sih, Risu bela-belain belajar dance!
subtitles.english:
Do you know, Risu went through
the trouble of learning the dance!

subtitles.original: My god, kalian harus tahu!
subtitles.english: My god, you guys have to know!

subtitles.original:
Jadi, kalian kalau nyadar ya,
di showcase-nya Risu, dia nggak ada nge-dance.
subtitles.english:
So, if you notice, in Risu's showcase,
she didn't dance.

subtitles.original: Iya.
subtitles.english: Yes.

subtitles.original: Iya, pas ini kita: "Risu, kamu nggak mau tahu, nge-dance!"
subtitles.english:
Yes, this time we said:
"Risu, like it or not, you're dancing!"

subtitles.original: Ini Risu, Yopi mau terima seriusan dikit ya.
subtitles.english: For Risu, Iofi wants to be a bit serious.

subtitles.original: Kalian kalau mau nangis, nangis aja semua.
subtitles.english: If you want to cry, just cry, everyone.

subtitles.original:
Jadi, yang nggak biasa nge-dance itu
di antara kita bertiga itu Risu...
subtitles.english:
So, the one who's not used to dancing
among the three of us is Risu...

subtitles.original:
...karena kayak kita, Risu, Start:Dash!! kui-kui
dia awalnya cuma kayak nyanyi doang...
subtitles.english:
...because like us, Risu, for "Start:Dash!!",
at first she was just like singing...

subtitles.original: Ah, bisa kayak nyanyi doang gitu. Ternyata...
subtitles.english: Ah, I thought I could just sing. Turns out...

subtitles.original: Ternyata... Bagaimana kalau kita nge-dance? Wah!
subtitles.english: Turns out... How about we dance? Wah!

subtitles.original: Risu kayak "Hah?", terus Moona bilang...
subtitles.english: Risu was like "Huh?", then Moona said...

subtitles.original: Kamu, kamu masuk ke dunia entertainment, idol, hololive...
subtitles.english: You, you entered the entertainment world, idols, hololive...

subtitles.original: Saatnya kamu belajar dance.
subtitles.english: It's time for you to learn to dance.

subtitles.original: Isimi!
subtitles.english: Isimi!

subtitles.original: Iya, gitu. Isimi, tahu nggak?
subtitles.english: Yeah, like that. Isimi, you know?

subtitles.original: Awalnya, awalnya Risu nggak bisa banget, guys.
subtitles.english: At first, at first Risu couldn't do it at all, guys.

subtitles.original: Sekarang udah bisa. Kalian lihat kan tadi? Hebat!
subtitles.english: Now she can. You saw it earlier, right? Great!

subtitles.original: Hebat lho.
subtitles.english: Great, really.

subtitles.original: Tadi tuh last minute kita sempet-sempet latihan juga.
subtitles.english: Earlier, last minute, we managed to practice too.

subtitles.original: Iya, kita sempet latihan.
subtitles.english: Yes, we practiced.

subtitles.original:
Kita sempet latihan lama.
Kita latihan dilihat Yagoo tahu nggak tadi?
subtitles.english:
We practiced for a long time.
We practiced while being watched by Yagoo, you know?

subtitles.original:
Kata Yagoo: "Ganbatte ne, minna.
Ganbatte ne, minna," katanya.
subtitles.english:
Yagoo said: "Good luck, everyone.
Good luck, everyone," he said.

subtitles.original: Sampai-sampai Moona bilang: "Yagoo, TONIGHT, IDOL!"
subtitles.english: To the point Moona said: "Yagoo, TONIGHT, IDOL!"

subtitles.original: Hebat bukan?
subtitles.english: Isn't it great?

subtitles.original: TONIGHT, IDOL! TONIGHT, IDOL!
subtitles.english: TONIGHT, IDOL! TONIGHT, IDOL!

subtitles.original: Terus Yagoo cuma kayak ketawa gitu ya.
subtitles.english: Then Yagoo just laughed.

subtitles.original:
Udah idol banget nggak sih, guys?
Lihat nih stage-nya, tuh, wheee!
subtitles.english:
Aren't we like totally idols now, guys?
Look at this stage, wheee!

subtitles.original:
Terus ya, terus ya. Kita tuh nggak cuman nge-idol nih.
Kita nggak cuman nge-idol.
subtitles.english:
And then, and then. We're not just being idols.
We're not just being idols.

subtitles.original: Kita ada PENGUMUMAN!
subtitles.english: We have an ANNOUNCEMENT!

subtitles.original: Oh, ada pengumuman apa nih?
subtitles.english: Oh, what's this announcement?

subtitles.original: Yes, we have a little bit announcement. Wah!
subtitles.english: Yes, we have a little bit of an announcement. Wah!

subtitles.original: Apa nih? Apa nih?
subtitles.english: What is it? What is it?

subtitles.original: Sudah siap? Sudah siap? Penasaran? Oke.
subtitles.english: Are you ready? Are you ready? Curious? Okay.

subtitles.original: Tiga, dua, satu...
subtitles.english: Three, two, one...

subtitles.original: INI DIA!
subtitles.english: HERE IT IS!

subtitles.original:
hololive Indonesia 3D Acrylic Stand
On Sale September 20 (JST)
subtitles.english:
hololive Indonesia 3D Acrylic Stand
On Sale September 20 (JST)

subtitles.original: Wah, apa nih?
subtitles.english: Wah, what's this?

subtitles.original:
Wah lucu banget! Acrylic Stand!
Eh ada aku! Ada aku juga!
subtitles.english:
Wow, so cute! Acrylic Stand!
Eh, there's me! There's me too!

subtitles.original: Oh my god, Acrylic Stand! Acrylic Stand, bestie!
subtitles.english: Oh my god, Acrylic Stand! Acrylic Stand, bestie!

subtitles.original:
Acrylic Stand-nya itu ya kalau nggak salah ya,
bukan yang kecil.
subtitles.english: The Acrylic Stand, if I'm not mistaken, is not the small one.

subtitles.original: Oh yang gede?
subtitles.english: Oh, the big one?

subtitles.original: Yang besar! Ini, guys, guys, guys, gimana, gimana?
subtitles.english:
The big one! This, guys, guys, guys,
how is it, how is it?

subtitles.original:
Itu tuh, size body approximately
220 mm until 235 mm.
subtitles.english: That, body size approximately 220 mm to 235 mm.

subtitles.original:
Yah, yang tinggi, yang tinggi.
Kayak gini, guys. Ah, cantik banget.
subtitles.english:
Yeah, the tall one, the tall one.
Like this, guys. Ah, so beautiful.

subtitles.original: Risu gimana, Ris? Risu gimana, Ris? Gimana, Ris?
subtitles.english:
Risu, how about it, Ris? Risu, how about it, Ris?
How is it, Ris?

subtitles.original: Ini... Kalau Risu gini ya.
subtitles.english: This... Risu is like this.

subtitles.original: Ekornya tuh, ekor pinggangnya tuh nggak bisa dinaikin.
subtitles.english: The tail, the tail at the waist can't be raised.

subtitles.original: Ayo pinggangmu! Pinggangmu!
subtitles.english: Come on, your waist! Your waist!

subtitles.original: Emang dari sananya!
subtitles.english: It's like that from the start!

subtitles.original: Terus, terus, ada apa lagi?
subtitles.english: Then, then, what else is there?

subtitles.original: Atau mau nyanyi dulu? Jelasin dulu deh. Oke.
subtitles.english: Or want to sing first? Explain first. Okay.

subtitles.original: So this is a 3D Acrylic Stand special with our 3D model and with our pose...
subtitles.english: So this is a 3D Acrylic Stand special with our 3D model and with our pose...

subtitles.original: ...because usually when we only have 2D models we don't really have any dynamic poses.
subtitles.english: ...because usually when we only have 2D models we don't really have any dynamic poses.

subtitles.original: For this is the first time.
subtitles.english: For this is the first time.

subtitles.original:
Yes, this is the first time. This is the first time
we have like literal dynamic, man, look at the pose!
subtitles.english:
Yes, this is the first time. This is the first time
we have like literal dynamic, man, look at the pose!

subtitles.original: Look at the pose! Pose! Pose!
subtitles.english: Look at the pose! Pose! Pose!

subtitles.original: Nah, kayak gitu. Misalkan aku kayak gini kali ya.
subtitles.english: So, like that. For example, I'm like this, I guess.

subtitles.original: Aku kayak gini. Oh Yopi yang gini kayaknya.
subtitles.english: I'm like this. Oh, Iofi is like this, I think.
